name: Mr. Pocket's Gold Rush
description:
Mr. Pocket's Gold Rush is a fast-paced shooter that takes place in a pixelated wild-west world.
It's a submission for Finally Finish Something 2022 Game Jam.

It's Mr.Pocket's lucky day.
Mr. Pocket was about to bring home a big chunk of gold ores he mined all day. But it's not Mr. Pocket alone who wants the wealth.
A group of bandits, lurking away around the mine, is waiting Mr.Pocket to come out with his cart full of golds. They plan to take over the cart. They are pretty confident with their manpower, and believed Mr. Pocket would give up.

Luckily, Mr. Pocket got his trusty rifle, that seemingly never run out of bullets.

Bring your hard-earned gold home,
while at the same time keeping the bandits at bay.

Credits
